data.name: Error_MissingParameter
data.value: Error: The .NET solution file to analyze must be provided as a parameter.
data.comment: The error message displayed when no command-line parameter is provided.

data.name: Information_CommencingAnalysis
data.comment: The message displayed when analysis is about to commence.

data.name: Information_NoDependencies
data.comment: The message displayed when no NuGet dependencies are found.

data.name: Information_TransitiveDependency
data.comment: The message displayed for each transitive NuGet dependency. {0} will be replaced by the dependency identifier and version.
